trans-unit.source: Defines a design-time object that is used to build strongly-typed runtime grammars that conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Definerer en utformingen-objekt som brukes til å bygge strongly-typed runtime grammars som samsvarer med den [tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) versjon 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: You can you construct an empty SrgsDocument instance and build a grammar by adding instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan du lage en tom SrgsDocument-forekomst og bygge en grammatikk ved å legge til forekomster av klasser som representerer SRGS elementer, for eksempel <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: You can also construct an SrgsDocument instance from an existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar file, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også lage en SrgsDocument forekomst fra en eksisterende fil med SRGS-kompatibel XML-grammatikk fra en forekomst av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, eller fra en forekomst av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: After the SrgsDocument object is created, it can be loaded into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object or compiled by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, enabling it to be read by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Når SrgsDocument-objektet er opprettet, kan den lastes inn i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt eller kompilert av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, å aktivere den leses av et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Se [opprette Grammars ved hjelp av SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) i den [System tale Programming veiledning for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for mer informasjon og eksempler.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter et tomt <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: To build a grammar within an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance, add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.
trans-unit.target: Å bygge en grammatikk i et tomt <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>serverforekomsten, legge til forekomster av klasser som representerer SRGS elementer, for eksempel <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse fra en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object used to create the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objektet brukes til å opprette den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: builder is .
trans-unit.target: builderis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class and specifies an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> object to be the root rule of the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse og angir en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"> </xref> objektet skal være regelen roten av grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: This constructor adds the specified rule to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and sets it as the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> rule for the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren legger til den angitte regelen skal den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>objekt med verdien som den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>regel for grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_root rule" name="root rule" href=""></xref> in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_root rule" name="root rule" href=""></xref> in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: grammarRootRule is .
trans-unit.target: grammarRootRuleis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class specifying the location of the XML document that is used to fill in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klassen angir plasseringen av XML-dokumentet som brukes til å fylle ut den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The location of the SRGS XML file.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av SRGS XML-filen.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: path is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: pather en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class from an instance of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that references an XML-format grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klassen fra en forekomst av <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>som refererer til en XML-grammatikk-formatfil.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that was created with the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> XML instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet som ble opprettet med den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> XML-forekomsten.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: srgsGrammar is .
trans-unit.target: srgsGrammaris .

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly reference information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen referanseinformasjon for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The AssemblyReferences property returns a string collection containing a list of the assembly references.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AssemblyReferences returnerer en streng samling som inneholder en liste over refererer til samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the code-behind information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter bakenforliggende kode informasjonen for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The CodeBehind property returns a string collection that contains a list of the code-behind documents.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CodeBehind returnerer en streng samling som inneholder en liste med bakenforliggende kode-dokumenter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kulturen informasjonen for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows og System.Speech API godta alle gyldige språket land-koder.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: En motor for talegjenkjenning som støtter denne språket landskoden må installeres på nytt for å utføre talegjenkjenning på språket som er angitt i egenskapen kultur.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Talegjenkjenningsmotorer som fulgte med Microsoft Windows 7 fungerer med følgende koder for språket land.

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Engelsk (Storbritannia) - en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: Engelsk (USA) - Tyskland Tyskland.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: Tysk (Tyskland) - es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: Spansk (Spain) - Fransk-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: Fransk (Frankrike) - Japan.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Japansk - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Kina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Taiwan) to-bokstav språkkoder for eksempel "no", "no" eller "a" er også tillatt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that contains the current culture information for <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt som inneholder kulturinformasjon om gjeldende for <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to Culture is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som ble tilordnet til kulturen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to Culture is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som ble tilordnet til kulturen er <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether line numbers should be added to inline scripts.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om linjenummer skal legges til innebygde skript.

trans-unit.source: The Debug property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if line numbers should be added for debugging purposes; otherwise the property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer feilsøking <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis linjenummer skal legges til feilsøkingsformål; ellers returneres <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the related namespaces for the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter relaterte navneområdene for gjeldende <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The ImportNamespaces property returns a string collection that contains a list of the related namespaces in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ImportNamespaces returnerer en streng samling som inneholder en liste over relaterte navneområdene i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programming language used for inline code in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir programmeringsspråket som brukes for innebygd kode i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The Language property returns the programming language to which <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> is currently set.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen språket returnerer programmeringsspråket som <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir modus for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The Mode property returns a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode> that determines the type of input that the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> expects.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen returnerer et medlem av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>som bestemmer inndatatypen som den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>forventer.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>

trans-unit.source: The two possible values are `Voice` for speech input, and `Dtmf` for input of dual-tone multi-frequency (DTMF) tones that are commonly associated with a telephone.
trans-unit.target: To mulige verdier er `Voice` for taleinndata og `Dtmf` for inndata for dobbel blir bedt om flere frekvens (DTMF) fargene forbindes med en telefon.

trans-unit.source: The recognition mode of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning-modusen til den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navneområdet for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The Namespace property returns the namespace for the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Namespace returnerer navneområdet for gjeldende <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the phonetic alphabet of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir alfabetet av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Phonetic alphabets are composed of phones, which consist of letters, numbers or characters, sometimes in combination.
trans-unit.target: Phonetic bokstaver består av telefoner, som består av bokstaver, tall eller tegn, noen ganger i kombinasjon.

trans-unit.source: Each phone describes a unique sound of speech.
trans-unit.target: Hver telefon beskriver en unik lyd tale.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the Latin alphabet, for which any letter may represent multiple spoken sounds.
trans-unit.target: Dette er annerledes i det latinske alfabetet som en bokstav kan representere flere sier lyd.

trans-unit.source: Consider the different pronunciations of the letter "c" in the words "candy" and "cease", or the different pronunciations of the letter combination "th" in the words "thing" and "those".
trans-unit.target: Vurder å annen uttaler for bokstaven "c" i ord "godteri" og "opphør" eller annen uttaler bokstav kombinasjonen "th" i ord "element" og "".

trans-unit.source: In System.Speech, you can use any of three phonetic alphabets to specify custom pronunciations: International Phone Alphabet (IPA), Universal Phone Set (UPS), or the SAPI phone set.
trans-unit.target: I System.Speech, kan du bruke en av tre phonetic bokstaver til å angi egendefinerte uttaler: internasjonalt telefonnummer alfabetet (IPA), Universal telefon angitt (UPS) eller den uspesifiserte ISAPI phone sett.

trans-unit.source: The specified phonetic alphabet determines which phone set will be used to define inline pronunciations for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objects.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte alfabetet bestemmer hvilket telefonnummer sett vil bli brukt til å definere innebygde uttaler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>

trans-unit.source: The phones specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> must match the phonetic alphabet specified in PhoneticAlphabet.
trans-unit.target: Telefoner som er angitt i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A>må samsvare med alfabetet angitt i PhoneticAlphabet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [Lexicons og Phonetic bokstaver](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Returns the phonetic alphabet that must be used to specify custom pronunciations in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alfabetet som skal brukes til å angi egendefinerte uttaler i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root rule of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den primære regelen for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object must already be in the document's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> before it can be set to the **root rule**.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objektet allerede må være i dokumentets <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>før den kan bare settes til den **roten regelen**.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the root rule for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object by using an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi root-regel for en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>objektet ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objektet som argument til den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>konstruktør.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Returns the rule that is designated as the root rule of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer regelen som er angitt som regelen roten av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rules that are currently defined for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av regler som er definert for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objects to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> by using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method on the Rules property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objekter til den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A>-metoden på egenskapen regler.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: If you initialize an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and specify an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> is automatically added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du initialisere et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>objekt, og angi et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objekt som argument, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>legges til i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> automatisk</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Returns the rules defined for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer regler som er definert den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the .NET scripting language for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir .NET skriptspråk for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Script" name="Script" href=""></xref> property returns the current .NET scripting language for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Script" name="Script" href=""> </xref> egenskapen returnerer gjeldende .NET skriptspråk for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the Script property to null.
trans-unit.target: Er gjort forsøk på å sette egenskapen skript til null.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the Script property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Er gjort forsøk på å sette egenskapen skript til en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object to an XML-format grammar file that conforms to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Skriver innholdet i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> -objekt til en XML-grammatikk formatfilen som samsvarer med den [tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) versjon 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> that is used to write the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>som brukes til å skrive den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: srgsGrammar is .
trans-unit.target: srgsGrammaris .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir basis-URIEN for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: XmlBase property gets a value that is used to resolve relative URIs in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: XmlBase egenskapen henter en verdi som brukes til å løse relativ URI-adresser i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Suppose the value for XmlBase is "http://www.contoso.com/" and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> contains a relative rule reference to another document, for example `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.
trans-unit.target: Sett verdien for XmlBase er "http://www.contoso.com/" og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>inneholder en relativ Regelreferanse til et annet dokument, for eksempel `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This creates the following absolute path to the external document: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
trans-unit.target: Dette oppretter følgende absolutt bane til det eksterne dokumentet: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.

trans-unit.source: The current base URI of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende basis-URIEN for <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.
